description: Narrated by Jeri Ryan of Star Trek, Voyager, this video features stunning visualizations and interviews with top experts in the field of science, technology and ufology including Jill Tarter, inspiration for the book and film, Con...
name: UFOs and Aliens: The Search for Truth

review.name: Quite good actually, in depth dated *late 1990s) but you might learn a few new things :)
review.reviewBody: Jerry Ryan from Star Trek-TNG is on board as the main narration but there are many in depth interviews with scientist and it doesn't just cover UFOs but theory and our relationship with what could be or not real, overall well balanced, it leaves you wondering, a sense of wonderment i like it
